attributes.action: give murderers a life sentence which actually means life in prison
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A few weeks ago I heard that Lord Chief Justice Lord Phillips, Britains most senior Judge, had said that murderers should not be given such lenghty sentences as Britains jails are becoming overcrowded.
To me, this is absolutely disgusting! If a person takes away someones life, surely the rest of their life should be spent behind bars. The pain and suffering to family members and friends must be horrendous and to give murderers reduced sentences just because we may overcrowd our jails is surely adding to their agony. Mr Blair, I urge you to look at sentencing in Britian. With rising gun crime and stabbings surely you must do something! Do not make a mockery of victims of murder!
